name: Space Bastards
description:
The Bastards Have Landed!

The latest instalment in the ongoing Sheep Snaggers series throws the heroic Starsheep into an endless arena battle to the death against hordes of monstrous Ming heads. Released to thunderous acclaim as part of the ROM 2016 homebrew games tournament, it's a lightning-fast take on the Asteroids-style shooter complete with mind-bending visuals and a thumping techno soundtrack.
